Question: Queen Elizabeth II honorarily knighted this person, among many other military accolades from foreign countries.
Hints: In July 1978, this person became deputy director of plans at the U.S Pacific Command in Hawaii.
This person was described by childhood friends as active and assertive, protective of his sisters and a skilled athlete.
In November 1988, this person was named commander of United States Central Command (CENTCOM), succeeding General George B Crist.
